name: space-whatever
description:
Control:

  • WASD to move
  • QE to roll
  • SPACE up, C down
  • SHIFT slows you down
  • F to grab & push cubes
  • R toggles your flashlight
  • Backquote to open / close tutorial
  • J to respawn
  • MOUSE to look in that direction
  • Right Click to recenter the camera
  • Grab green cubes to add fuel
  • Send basketballs to the hoop
